## ValidControlObject type

Represents a map of properties from TForm with an associated control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValidControlObject<TForm, TFormState extends object | null = null> = {
    [P in keyof TForm]: ValidControl<TForm, P, TFormState>;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [ValidControl](./dynamic-forms.validcontrol.md)
